definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: In addition, it does not impose any limitation on the sloped angle of the trapezoid.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法可以應用於梯形斜邊任意坡度角的情況。

sentences.english: I want to compute the length of the hypotenuse of a right triangle.
sentences.chinese: 我想計算下，直角三角形的斜邊。

sentences.english: A part of the touchpad buttons are already on the beveled edge.
sentences.chinese: 觸摸板按鍵的部分已在斜邊。

sentences.english: Need to switch, else you'll be calculating values based on the wrong hypotenuse .
sentences.chinese: 需要切換，否則你會在錯誤的計算斜邊的值。

sentences.english: Compute the lengths of the hypotenuse and the other small side.
sentences.chinese: 計算斜邊和其它小的邊的長度。

sentences.english: Ultra flat and true Blades Uniform bevel edge using the "Agilis Edge" technology. Full width-constant contact of the Blade to drum.
sentences.chinese: 超平面和精確的葉片斜邊統一使用“敏銳邊緣”技術。
